item.title: By: Matt (B-I-L)
item.dc:creator: Matt (B-I-L)
item.description: <p>I get the same poblem, I always feel terrible the next morning after a few drinks and a curry, but when I eat something else I'm ok aswell.<br/>Hope alls well with everyone</p><p>Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
I get the same poblem, I always feel terrible the next morning after a few drinks and a curry, but when I eat something else I’m ok aswell.
Hope alls well with everyone

Matt

item.title: By: Matt
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: <p>I have a new theory that it's not the alcohol that's the problem but actually the curry after the booze. Recently I have only had a (bad) hangover after having a curry but if we go for pizza or something else then there are no problems. Next time I am out drinking I'll obviously remember to carry out a more scientific study of this theory.</p>
item.content:encoded: I have a new theory that it’s not the alcohol that’s the problem but actually the curry after the booze. Recently I have only had a (bad) hangover after having a curry but if we go for pizza or something else then there are no problems. Next time I am out drinking I’ll obviously remember to carry out a more scientific study of this theory.

item.title: By: Fi
item.dc:creator: Fi
item.description: <p>Poor Matthew!! I recommend tablets, tea and gingernuts (to help with the nausea!)</p>
item.content:encoded: Poor Matthew!! I recommend tablets, tea and gingernuts (to help with the nausea!)
